profileText: a Representative from New York; born in Island Park, Nassau County, N.Y., February 22, 1982; graduated from Chaminade High School, Mineola, N.Y., 2000; B.A., Hofstra University, Hempstead, N.Y., 2004; police detective; fire fighter; member of the Hempstead, N.Y., town council, 2016-2023; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress (January 3, 2023-present).
